Package bftsmart.tom.leaderchange

Class RequestsTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bftsmart.tom.leaderchange.RequestsTimer
  • public class RequestsTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    This thread serves as a manager for all timers of pending requests.
